categories: Category:Battles of the Galactic Civil War

nodes.text: Escape from an unidentified ocean planet

Princess Leia Organa and Jedi Padawan Luke Skywalker escaped from an ocean planet sometime after the mission to Ktath'atn. The duo sought to draw the forces of the Galactic Empire away from a peaceful species that were caught in the middle of the war when the Empire began searching their planet for the rebels.
